name: Ghanshyam Trading
overview:
Established in the year 1987, we, “Ghanshyam Trading Co.”, are one of the leading distibutors of Laboratory Glassware, Laboratory Plasticware, Laboratory Instrument, Laboratory Filter Paper, HPLC Column, Laboratory Chemical and Labware.

Milestones: Ghanshyam Trading Co. Started in 1987 Became the Authorised dealer of Qualigens Fine Chemicals in 1996 Became C&F Agent of Thomas Baker in 1999 Authorised dealer of Rankem in the year 2000 Dealership of Borosil achieved in 2005 Authorisation for Whatman received in 2007 Surat office began in 2008

Business Associates We ensure to source the offered range of Laboratory Glassware, Laboratory Plasticware, Laboratory Instrument, Laboratory Filter Paper, HPLC Column, Laboratory Chemical and Labware from well known associates of the market.

Our Team: Procuring agent Chemical analysts Quality controllers Researchers Warehouse personnel Skilled workers Marketing personnel

Our Quality: Quality remains a boosting aspect for our firm, which ensures an apex level position in this domain. Hence, we have constructed a sophisticated quality testing laboratory, which is installed with modern machines and latest technology that aid us in offering a defect-free range of Laboratory Glassware, Laboratory Plasticware, Laboratory Instrument, Laboratory Filter Paper, HPLC Column, Laboratory Chemical and Labware.

Warehousing and Packaging: We have a large warehousing unit that assists us in accommodating our range of Chemicals, Minerals and Pesticides. Our range is stored effectively in the warehouse with the support of our experts, who hold extensive knowledge in this industry regarding safe handling of Chemicals, Minerals and Pesticides.
